sys_openapi_operation.name: Return the list of possible relations between source and target asset
sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation: {"fName":"Return the list of possible relations between source and target asset","fOperationId":"possibleRelations","fDescription":"This API returns the available relationship types (child, parent and available capability ids) for two assets (sourceId, targetId).\nIf the specified two assets are already linked in every possible way, then the result will be empty.\nThis endpoint is the most beneficial if you use it before creating a new link between two assets.","fPath":"/assetmgmt/assetLinks/possibleRelations","fHttpMethod":"GET","fDeprecated":false,"fResponses":[{"fStatusCode":"200","fDescription":"successful
